title: Stocks to Watch: A Market Update from BlackRock's Gargi Chaudhuri
description: Barron's senior managing editor Lauren R. Rublin speaks with reporter, Nicholas Jasinski and Gargi Chaudhuri, head of iShares Investment Strategy Americas at BlackRock, on the outlook for financial markets, retailers' earnings, and the best ETFs to play investment themes such as dividend growth, agtech, and cybersecurity.
